game.name: I'm in Love With Your Dead Grandmother
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Touch Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Hello, I'm Noah. I'm 28 years old and still haven't got a single date in my life, I'm looking for a life coach who can help me figure out the hard choices in my day to day life, you know? I'm sad and single, I have some friends online, but that's it.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hello, I'm Noah. I'm 28 years old and still haven't got a single date in my life, I'm looking for a life coach who can help me figure out the hard choices in my day to day life, you know? I'm sad and single, I have some friends online, but that's it.
